languages.text:
The familiar immediately restores 100% Wounds. The familiar is also resurrected if it has 0 Wounds. The next 3 Overseer abilities cost -1 AP.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer's allies benefit from the {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}Scried{/g} status applied to the enemies. Also, the allies in the Servoskull Swarm's {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} area are immune to crits.

traits.locale_text:
The familiar immediately restores 100% Wounds. The familiar is also resurrected if it has 0 Wounds. The next 3 Overseer abilities cost -1 AP.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer's allies benefit from the {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}Scried{/g} status applied to the enemies. Also, the allies in the Servoskull Swarm's {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} area are immune to crits.

languages.text:
The servo-skull swarm immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer's allies also ignore the {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} of enemies that are {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}under surveillance{/g}. Additionally, allies within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Рой сервочерепов немедленно полностью восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} (даже при 0 здоровья), также с него снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывания{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}. Три следующие {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.
До конца боя союзники надзирателя также игнорируют {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g} противников {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}под наблюдением{/g}. Кроме того, союзники в радиусе 4 клеток вокруг роя сервочерепов не получают {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критических попаданий{/g}.

languages.text:
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm regeneriert seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} vollständig (selbst wenn er 0 Wunden hat). Er wird von sämtlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}-Effekten befreit. Die nächsten drei {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} kosten -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes ignorieren Verbündete des Aufsehers die {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} von Gegnern, die {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}unter Beobachtung{/g} stehen. Außerdem sind Verbündete in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm gegen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Treffer{/g} immun.

The servo-skull swarm immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer's allies also ignore the {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} of enemies that are {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}under surveillance{/g}. Additionally, allies within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.

languages.text:
L'essaim de servocrânes régénère immédiatement toute sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} (même s'il n'en a aucune). Tout effet d'{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} dont il souffre est dissipé. Le coût des trois prochaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} est réduit de −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les alliés du surveillant ignorent la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} des ennemis {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}sous surveillance{/g}. De plus, les alliés dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes bénéficient d'une immunité contre les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer's allies also ignore the {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} of enemies that are {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}under surveillance{/g}. languages.text:
完全恢复伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}（即便生命值为0也可以完全恢复），同时移除{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}效果。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}接下来的3个{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。
监察官的盟友攻击处于{g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}一览无余{/g}状态的敌人时，也同样会无视目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}效果，且距离伺服头骨集群4格范围内所有盟友都对{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}免疫。上述效果持续至战斗结束。

The servo-skull swarm immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer's allies also ignore the {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} of enemies that are {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}under surveillance{/g}. Additionally, allies within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.

监察官的盟友攻击处于{g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}一览无余{/g}状态的敌人时，也同样会无视目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}效果，且距离伺服头骨集群4格范围内所有盟友都对{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}免疫。上述效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
El enjambre de servocráneos recupera inmediatamente todas las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} (aunque esté a 0 heridas). Cualquier efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} que sufra queda eliminado. Las siguientes 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} cuestan −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, los aliados del supervisor también ignoran la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} de enemigos {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}bajo vigilancia{/g}. Además, los aliados en un radio de 4 casillas del enjambre de servocráneos son inmunes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impactos críticos{/g}.

El enjambre de servocráneos recupera inmediatamente todas las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} (aunque esté a 0 heridas). Las siguientes 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} cuestan −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, los aliados del supervisor también ignoran la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} de enemigos {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}bajo vigilancia{/g}. Además, los aliados en un radio de 4 casillas del enjambre de servocráneos son inmunes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impactos críticos{/g}.

languages.text:
サーヴォスカル・スウォームは即座に全快まで回復する（{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0の場合も）。{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}効果は取り除かれる。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の次の3つの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}コストが-1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}される。
戦闘終了まで、監督官の味方も{g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}監督下{/g}の敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}を無視できる。さらに、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セル以内の味方は{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}耐性を付与される。

The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer's allies also ignore the {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} of enemies that are {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}under surveillance{/g}. Additionally, allies within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
サーヴォスカル・スウォームは即座に全快まで回復する（{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0の場合も）。{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}効果は取り除かれる。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の次の3つの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}コストが-1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}される。
戦闘終了まで、監督官の味方も{g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}監督下{/g}の敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}を無視できる。さらに、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セル以内の味方は{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}耐性を付与される。

languages.text:
Hizmelet sürüsü, anında iyileşerek tam {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlığına{/g} kavuşur (sağlık puanı 0 olsa bile). Üzerindeki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g} etkileri ortadan kalkar. {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in sonraki üç {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} 1 puan daha az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar.
Çatışma sonuna dek Gözetmen'in dost birimleri de {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}gözetim altındaki{/g} düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperlerini{/g} yok sayar. Ayrıca hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan dost birimler, {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşlara{/g} karşı bağışıklık kazanır.
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer's allies also ignore the {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} of enemies that are {g|f:5fcfda67ccb14a66a0ff79d2b9ee250c}under surveillance{/g}. Additionally, allies within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.
